title: Not bad
text: It was an ok experience...the service was good (just that there was none in the lobby after 9 pm the lobby was on roadside....they showed up only in the morning.) The rooms were big and nice. They had a free parking space too. Bus stop is just outside the hotel for golden gate bridge and 1 block to 30 number bus which can take you to union square/chinatown, etc. so a good location .walsgreen just in front . ATMs and Banks 2-3 blocksNot bad for the price.
